title: Not gunna lie.
body:
Poppy is a huge Yasuo buff.

and also very cool.

replies.body:
except that enemies knocked back by poppy's ult are untargetable

so i assume you cant ult them with yasuo
she still has 2 other knock ups tho.
Her Qs only AOE damage... Her E displacements 1.
Her dash knocks them back, her E knocks them up if they dash into it, and i thought her r did too but maybe not.

Her W* and I don't think it's a knockup (You can see ability descriptions from Surrenderat20.net and it only states it stops dashes and doesn't do so when they are untargetable (stops fizz Q not his E) and abilities usually list if they are a knockup effect or w/e so pretty sure it's just an animation to make it obvious to you something has happened and to highlight your Champion and show a visual of what has happened (You stopped dashing and were micro bumped as an indication) and that her R makes them untargetable and with no Channel is basically a knockup (still untargetable) and at max charge is a 3000 range knockback (ciao/adios amigos) so pretty sure she only has her E to trigger Yasuo's Ult popup.
Game has weird things in it though so you could be right.
If you charge up it up reeeeeaaally small it doesn't knock them back too far
